mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DEPTNO, SPOT, "POSITION", ESTATUS, JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, LEAVE, AUTH, PROFILE, FAIL FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE ID= #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND FAIL < 5
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DNAME, SPOT, "POSITION", ESTATUS, JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, LEAVE, AUTH, PROFILE FROM EMPLOYEE e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO ORDER BY NAME

SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DNAME , SPOT, "POSITION", ESTATUS, JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, LEAVE, AUTH, PROFILE FROM EMPLOYEE e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DNAME, SPOT, "POSITION", ESTATUS, JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, LEAVE, AUTH, PROFILE FROM EMPLOYEE e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO WHERE ESTATUS = #{estatus}

SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DNAME, SPOT, "POSITION", ESTATUS, JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, LEAVE, AUTH, PROFILE FROM EMPLOYEE e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO
WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE DNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET NAME = #{name} , DEPTNO = #{deptno}, SPOT = #{spot} , EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone}, PROFILE= #{profile} WHERE ID = #{id} AND ESTATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET AUTH = #{auth} WHERE ID = #{id} AND DEPTNO = #{deptno}
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET ESTATUS = 'N' , EXIT_DAY = #{exit_day} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE e (ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, DEPTNO, SPOT, "POSITION", JOIN_DAY, EXIT_DAY, ETYPE, PROFILE) VALUES( (SELECT COALESCE ((SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(ID)+1) FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE ID LIKE (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{join_day}),'YYMMDD'))||#{deptno}||'%') ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{join_day}),'YYMMDD')||#{deptno}||'01') AS ID FROM DUAL),#{name}, #{email},#{phone},#{birthday},#{gender}, #{address},#{deptno},#{spot},#{position}, TO_DATE(#{join_day}),#{exit_day},#{etype},#{profile})
